original: sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi 🔽na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭigham na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca anidassana sappaṭighaḥ ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā satta
translated: With non-evident-non-impacting and without root-cause as condition, a non-evident-non-impacting and without root-cause dhammā arise by way of root-cause condition … seven.

analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na ahetukam ca na a nidassana sa paṭigham na ahetukam ca dhamma
translated: With non-evident-non-impacting and without root-cause and with non-evident-non-impacting and without root-cause as condition,

original: paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca anidassana sappaṭighaḥ ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta
translated: a non-evident-non-impacting and without root-cause dhammā arise by way of root-cause condition … seven. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa
translated: With root-cause twenty-one, with object three … with non-hindrance twenty-one.
